content:
I don't have personal preferences. however, some of the most popular contemporary horror authors are:

1. stephen king
2. clive barker
3. joe hill
4. neil gaiman
5. lauren beukes
6. john ajvide lindqvist
7. paul tremblay
8. peter straub
9. carmen maria machado
10. josh malerman

these authors are known for their ability to create horror and psychological dread using modern themes and storytelling techniques. you can check out their work to see which ones you enjoy the most.
